Sentence: The NEF verifies the token and check the service request against the verified token.

Sentence: The NEF checks if the subject claim of the token matches the subject claim of the certificate of the NWDAF.

Sentence: The NEF checks that the token has not expired by verifying the expiration time in the token against the current data/time.
